name: Pacific Gunship Strike 3D
description:
War Gunships - Pacific Battle: Fly powerful gunship helicopters on your fingertips in the pacific battle. As a pilot of gunship helicopter, experience challenging scenarios, use tactics, and carefully utilize ammunition to win the pacific war.

War Gunships Features
- Combat helicopters
- Smart enemy AI
- Many weapons
- Ground as well as aerial targets
- Lots of entertainment

Note: The game is free but it Contains advertising. You can remove ads with in-app purchase. For a smooth game play we recommend minimum iphone6 or above.

Please don’t hesitate to rate us.
